name: Dice Dice Baby
description:
Survive the never ending horde of Skull Demons and kill as many as you can, While a Dice pentagram rolls randomly.  prepare to be blessed and maybe, probably, well....most definitely cursed.

Controls

Arrow Keys to move and Shoot 

And Occasionally Space Bar

This will be my first ever completed Game for the GM TK Game Jam!!!!!

I hope you all enjoy!!!!

Team Members

Liam McAlinden - Game Design, Art

Josh Schwarm - Game Design, Art

Quinn Goffin - Game Design, Music (This Guy Made the Amazing Soundtrack)
